translation:
Hello! 👋 This is the Telegram bot *FrescoAiBot*. I interact with _ChatGPT_, as well as with the image generation neural network _Dall-E_ 🤖

What does this mean?

📲 *ChatGPT mode* works with textual information. You can ask me any question, request to write a congratulatory message or a text for a publication, or develop a plan for any action (content, nutrition, workouts, etc.). I have 2 versions:

▪️ _GPT-3.5_ — this is an enhanced model after GPT-3, which is one of the most powerful for text generation.

▪️ _GPT-4_ has an even larger number of parameters than the previous models. It has improved the ability to understand and generate texts, as well as the functionality for tasks that require logical thinking and context recognition.

🎨 *Dall-E 3 Mode* generates images upon request. For example, you can ask me to draw a cat playing with a ball, and I will send you a picture in response.

💬 *Dialog (context) mode* helps to supplement the request. When the context is activated, I take into account my previous answer and augment it with a new command. For example, you asked me to write a birthday greeting. In the next message, you can specify that the greeting is for your best friend, and I will send an updated version.

💬 ❌ If you want to start a dialogue on a new topic, causing the bot to forget the context of the previous conversation, use the command: /forget

👉 *Access to the bot:*

In my free version, you have access to 5️⃣ requests per day (they reset every 24 hours). To increase the number of requests and also gain access to _GPT-4_ and _«Dialog» mode_, you can subscribe on a monthly basis:

✅ Start: 1️⃣0️⃣ requests per day — $4.5
✅ Pro: 2️⃣0️⃣ requests per day — $9.9
✅ Boss: 5️⃣0️⃣ requests per day — $19.9

*Payment methods:*

💳 Card
💲 Cryptocurrency

💸 Buy a subscription /buy

🎁 I also love to give gifts! You can invite a friend and get a free «Start» subscription for 7 days. To get an invitation link, use the command /invite

To select a mode, click on the button with its name ⬇️

🌟 *More Queries*. With a subscription, you will increase the number of daily requests for the bot. If you use all 5 requests in the free version, with the subscription, you won't have to wait 24 hours for access to be refreshed, and you will be able to continue interacting with the bot.

🎉 *Access to ChatGPT-4*. With the subscription, you will unlock access to ChatGPT-4 mode. This is an improved model that better understands and generates texts and works with tasks requiring logical thinking and context recognition.

💸 *Choose a monthly subscription*:

✅ Start: 1️⃣0️⃣ requests per day — $4.5
✅ Pro: 2️⃣0️⃣ requests per day — $9.9
✅ Boss: 5️⃣0️⃣ requests per day — $19.9

*Payment Methods*:

💳 Card
💲 Cryptocurrency

*How to Pay?*

1. Select a plan
2. Click the «Buy» button
3. Follow the link to our partner's page and select a convenient payment method

Buy Subscription ⬇️
❌ Something went wrong. 🤕 Try again later.

📊*Subscription Information*

Your subscription: %s (%d requests per day)
Available: %d requests
Valid until: %s
Technical support: @dendefoe

🎁 Invite a friend and get a 7-day «Start» subscription for free. To get your invitation link, use the /invite command.

💸 To upgrade your plan: /buy
❌ Sorry, the message type you sent is currently not supported
❌ You have sent a message that is too short. The minimum number of characters is 4.

⚙️ *Bot Settings*

In this section, you can:

✅ Select the interface language (English/Russian).

✅ Choose the ChatGPT mode for working with text information.
FrescoAiBot offers 2 versions:

▪️ GPT-3.5 — this is an advanced next-generation model after GPT-3 (Generative Pre-trained Transformer 3), which is one of the most powerful models for text generation.

▪️ GPT-4 has even more parameters than the previous models. Its capabilities to understand and generate texts are improved, as well as its performance on tasks that require logical thinking and context recognition.

✅ Choose the Dall-E 3 mode for image generation.

✅ Enable or disable context support (dialogue mode). When the context is activated, the bot takes into account its previous response and complements it with a new command.

📲Technical Support: @dendefoe

To select a mode, press the button with its name ⬇️

😥 Sorry, you have run out of messages.

Contact: @dendefoe

🎁 Invite a friend and get a «Start» subscription for 7 days for free. To get a referral link, use the /invite command.
💸 To purchase a subscription: /buy

🎁 *Invite a Friend*

Invite a friend and get a 7-day «Start» subscription as a gift 🎉

To do this, copy the invitation link and send it to a friend:

➡️ `https://t.me/call_fresco_bot?start=ref%d`

After your friend joins the bot, I will activate your subscription for you and send a notification 📩

The number of invitations is unlimited. Every week you can invite a new friend and get a free subscription 🤩

👋 If you have any questions, you can contact technical support: @dendefoe

🎉 Congratulations!

Your referral invitation was successful, and a new user has registered using your link! As a token of our gratitude, I have activated a bonus subscription "Start" for you for 7 days 🎁✅

Enjoy the extended features and thank you for spreading the word about me!
If you have any questions, please feel free to ask. Enjoy your enhanced experience! 🤖🩵
The bot has successfully forgotten the dialogue context 🧹
🫰💵 Not available for users without a subscription

🎉 Congratulations! Your payment has been processed successfully! 🥳

💡 You now have access to all the premium features of our bot. Start exploring the new possibilities right now and get the most out of our service!

🔒 Thank you for trusting our bot. We promise continuous improvement and updating of our services for your convenience.

✅ Enjoy your subscription and look forward to loads of useful content!

If you have any questions or need support, please contact us at any time - we are always happy to help!
The bot is thinking, please wait a moment...
The bot is drawing, please wait...
